tool_description: Configures monitoring parameters for broadcast media outlets including radio, TV, and digital broadcasts to detect music usage across specified channels and time periods.

monitoring_regions.description: Array of geographic regions to monitor (country codes)

audio_fingerprints.description: Array of audio fingerprint hashes for track identification

monitoring_schedule.description: Monitoring frequency: continuous, hourly, daily, weekly

channel_priorities.description: Priority levels for different channels (1-5, 5 being highest)

error_messages: Invalid region codes: Use valid ISO country codes for monitoring_regions.
Unsupported broadcast type: Use supported types like radio, tv, digital_radio, streaming_radio.
Fingerprint limit exceeded: Maximum 10000 audio fingerprints per monitoring setup.
Invalid schedule: Use continuous, hourly, daily, or weekly for monitoring_schedule.
Invalid priority values: Channel priorities must be integers between 1-5.
usage: Specify monitoring_regions, broadcast_types, audio_fingerprints, and monitoring_schedule. Optionally set channel_priorities. This creates a monitoring configuration for use with Broadcast Usage Detector.

monitor_config_id.description: Unique identifier for the monitoring configuration

estimated_coverage.description: Estimated percentage of broadcast coverage in specified regions

active_channels.description: Number of channels that will be monitored
